feature_name: Hub beta dropdown option text legibility fix
scope_summary: Improve native select-menu readability in Hub beta by setting explicit high-contrast text and background colors for dropdown option rows, so humor/personality selections are legible on dark-themed UIs.

legal_and_regulatory.rationale: Pure visual contrast fix with no policy, consent, or legal-surface changes.

privacy_local_first_promise.rationale: Only CSS presentation changed; no storage, tracking, or network behavior changed.
evidence: No JavaScript logic or request endpoints were modified

medical_scope_and_claims.rationale: No claim-language or medical-context copy changed.

behavioral_science_alignment.rationale: Increasing option readability reduces cognitive friction and selection errors for users configuring tone and support preferences.
evidence: Fix targets the exact unreadable dropdown state reported by user screenshot

neurodivergence_research_alignment.rationale: No new neurodivergence claims were introduced.

user_benefit_and_harm_check.rationale: Benefit is immediate readability and lower mis-selection risk; foreseeable harm is minimal because only option-row paint colors changed.
evidence: Selected option remains unchanged while menu rows gain contrast
No workflow or content semantics changed

brand_voice_and_claims.rationale: Brand messaging and product claims were unchanged.

accessibility_and_inclusion.rationale: Explicit high-contrast option styling directly addresses low-legibility text in native dropdown menus.
evidence: Options now render dark text on light background in the expanded list
Improves readability for low-vision and low-stim users

security_and_reliability.rationale: Static CSS change only; no runtime state, routing, or security boundary changes.
evidence: No script bundle changes required for this fix
Ship filter and existing CI workflows remain green

monetization_and_dark_pattern_check.rationale: No pricing, purchase flow, or behavioral monetization changes.

ship_decision.conditions: Ship and verify the Humor dropdown options are readable in the expanded menu on dark theme backgrounds.
